text:
期末計畫展演，組織與報告：50%
- 計畫展演的方式將以開放的短會 unconference 方式進行，由各組同學彼此協調與自行組織，藉此練習學習、組織與團隊協作的翻轉學習精神。
- 以黑客松 ([redacted_id]) 方式進行公開之跨領域小組協作競賽。
上課方式分為兩部分：針對每週主題有 2 個小時的解說，與 1 個小時的實作教學。
trans:
Final Project Presentation, Organization, and Report: 50%
The project presentation will be conducted in an open unconference format, where each group of students coordinates and organizes themselves, thereby practicing the flipped learning spirit of learning, organization, and teamwork.
A public cross-disciplinary group collaboration competition will be held in a hackathon ([redacted_id]) format.
The class will be divided into two parts: 2 hours of explanation for the weekly topics and 1 hour of practical instruction.
